Yes, the one in your comment looks much richer (and of course, you can see a bit more of the edge detail). 
Aren't the structures they built to fish the falls amazing?

comment.author: 91859144@N00
comment._content:
I love these old photographs of Celilo.  It breaks my heart that it's buried under the river now.

Thanks so much for posting these!  they're fascinating!

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: You are quite welcome-- they are certainly an amazing glimpse into the past.

comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Aren't the structures they built to fish the falls amazing? Do we know what these structures are? Are they the frames for the dam or were they there before the dam, for some other reason?

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: I think they were built before the dam, but that's a good question! I'll see what I can find out.
